Question: Texas Instruments CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Texas Instruments

Product 1

- AWR2544 77GHz millimeter-wave radar sensor chip designed for advanced driver assistance systems (ADAS) with satellite radar architecture for improved sensor fusion and decision-making capabilities
- Uses waveguide interface package (LOP) technology to reduce sensor size by up to 30% and enable extended sensor range to over 200m
- New driver chips DRV3946-Q1 and DRV3901-Q1 for battery management systems and powertrains, compliant with ISO 26262 functional safety standard, with built-in diagnostics and safety features
